title: Dear League Sub-Reddit
body:
Almost all of you are bronze and silver. Almost all of you don't have a clue when it comes to balance. Almost all of you are bronz%%%%%s that literally wouldn't know actual discussion even if it slapped you in the dick. Yes this holds true for boards - what does this say? Most low elos are whiney and unwilling to listen to reason. That's not a shocker. But boards have GD and GD personalities and we have hilarious inner circle jerking and don't spam Lee montages all the time. So despite boards unfortunate shortcomings as well, they are still 50x better than leagues subreddit will ever be. 

And they have me. And I'm not bronze or silver.  Yeah.
